name: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: The Great Gatsby is a novel by American author F. Scott Fitzgerald. The book was first published in 1925, and it has been republished in 1945 and 1953. The Great Gatsby is a novel about the American Dream, and the book is set in the 1920s.

name: Animal Farm
author: George Orwell
description: Animal Farm is a novel about a group of farm animals who rebel against their human farmer, and the book is a satire of the Russian Revolution.
